docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Sept. 13 -- The possibility that the A.B.C. arrangement between Argentina, Brazil and Chile may be revised into a military alliance against foreign aggression is indicated by the conversations that the Argentine Minister of...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Sept. 13 -- The possibility that the A.B.C. arrangement between Argentina, Brazil and Chile may be revised into a military alliance against foreign aggression is indicated by the conversations that the Argentine Minister of War, General Juan N. Tonazzi, had last month in Rio de Janeiro with Brazilian military chiefs, and the similar talks now under way in Santiago, Chile.
docs.abstract: Argentine Brazilian and Chilean mil alliance hinted

headline.main: LATIN TALKS HINT A.B.C. ARMY PACT; Argentine War Minister Is Now in Chile Following Parleys in Brazil

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 21 (AP) -- Uruguay, which has promised the United States the use of her seaports and other facilities in the event of war, will begin construction soon of a huge naval air base on the Atlantic coast, informed sources...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Sept. 21 (AP) -- Uruguay, which has promised the United States the use of her seaports and other facilities in the event of war, will begin construction soon of a huge naval air base on the Atlantic coast, informed sources reported today.
